name: py-mouseinfo
description:
An application to display XY position and RGB color information for the
pixel currently under the mouse. Works on Python 2 and 3. This is useful
for GUI automation planning.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-python3-xlib
dependencies.description: python3-xlib is python3 version of python-xlib.

dependencies.name: py-python-xlib
dependencies.description:
The Python X Library is intended to be a fully functional X client
library for Python programs. It is written entirely in Python, in
contrast to earlier X libraries for Python (the ancient X extension and
the newer plxlib) which were interfaces to the C Xlib.

dependencies.name: py-pyperclip
dependencies.description: A cross-platform clipboard module for Python.

dependencies.name: pil
dependencies.description:
The Python Imaging Library (PIL) adds image processing capabilities to
your Python interpreter. This library supports many file formats, and
provides powerful image processing and graphics capabilities.

dependent_to.name: py-pyautogui
dependent_to.description:
PyAutoGUI lets your Python scripts control the mouse and keyboard to
automate interactions with other applications.
